text.jpText:
Hmm, five minutes over the scheduled departure time.
However, there was still no sign of Yukinobidine and Gold City. ......
text.enText:
Hmm, five minutes over the scheduled departure time.
However, there was still no sign of Yukinobidine and Gold City. ......

text.jpText:
...... We don't have to go together, do we?
We're going to the same camp, we can meet there.
text.enText:
...... We don't have to go together, do we?
We're going to the same camp, we can meet there.

text.jpText:
If you're asking if it's necessary, yes, it is... ......
I'm sure you'll be happy to hear that.
text.enText:
If you're asking if it's necessary, yes, it is... ......
I'm sure you'll be happy to hear that.

text.jpText:
The bus ride to the training camp is rather long, isn't it?　Karen, I've prepared a lot of things
Karen, I've prepared a lot of things so that we can talk a lot!
text.enText:
The bus ride to the training camp is rather long, isn't it?　Karen's prepared a lot of things
so that we can talk a lot!

text.jpText:
Thank you for your concern, Karen-chan.
Together we will create the Sundaisai, and I too believe that harmony is necessary.
text.enText:
Thank you for your concern, Karen-chan.
Together we will create the Sundaisai, and I too believe that harmony is necessary.

text.jpText:
Fortunately, we still have some time to spare.
Wait another five minutes, and then--
text.enText:
Fortunately, we still have some time to spare.
Wait another five minutes, and then--

text.jpText: I'm sorry!
text.enText: I'm sorry!

text.jpText: Oh!　Yukino and Cichy, they're here! They're here!　Are you okay?
text.enText: Oh!　Yukino and Cichy, they're here! They're here!　Are you okay?

text.jpText:
Hi, haha ......, you guys are so uninteresting!
Because I took so long to prepare for the camp, ......!
text.enText:
Hi, haha ......, you guys are so uninteresting!
Because I took so long to prepare for the camp, ......!

text.jpText:
No, it's my fault!　It's because I overslept.
I'm sure you'll be glad to know that I'm not the only one who has a problem with this.
text.enText:
No, it's my fault!　It's because I overslept.
I'm sure you'll be glad to know that I'm not the only one who has a problem with this.

text.jpText: No, no, I was already late when I picked you up!
text.enText: No, no, I was already late when I picked you up!

text.jpText:
No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.
I was just doing something stupid.
text.enText:
No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.
I was just doing something stupid.

text.jpText: Yes, I'm going to fight the "I'm the bad guy" battle!
text.enText: Yes, I'm going to fight the "I'm the bad guy" battle!

text.jpText:
Let's head for the bus station as soon as possible!
We were told that the time was still good, so don't panic.
text.enText:
Let's head for the bus station as soon as possible!
We were told that the time was still good, so don't panic.

text.jpText: Haha ...... In your own words, it's a "difficult road ahead".
text.enText: Haha ...... In your own words, it's a "difficult road ahead".

text.jpText:
Hmm. Is that so?
--Well, let's get going.
text.enText:
Hmm. Is that so?
--Well, let's get going.

text.jpText:
A training camp, finally!　This is the royal road!　Japanese style!　Japanese style!
Oh, Brian, can I take one for the back of the inn?
text.enText:
A training camp, finally!　This is the royal road!　Japanese style!　Japanese style!
Oh, Brian, can I take one for the back of the inn?

text.jpText: You're really noisy, ...... as you were on the ...... bus.
text.enText: You're really noisy, ...... as you were on the ...... bus.

text.jpText:
I'm sure she's a little excited.
But she's like Maya, so she's easy to get to know, isn't she?
text.enText:
I'm sure she's a little excited.
But she's like Maya, so she's easy to get to know, isn't she?

text.jpText: ............ It's an infuriating misunderstanding.
text.enText: ............ It's an infuriating misunderstanding.

text.jpText:
Ah, it's the members of the Trespassing Academy!
Thank you for the long journey. Welcome aboard!
text.enText:
Ah, it's the members of the Trespassing Academy!
Thank you for the long journey. Welcome aboard!

text.jpText:
Hello. This is Simbolilldorf, the person I called the other day.
Thank you very much for your cooperation with the training camp.
text.enText:
Hello. This is Simbolilldorf, the person I called the other day.
Thank you very much for your cooperation with the training camp.

text.jpText:
No, no, no!　My grandson is also a horse girl, and he looks forward to the Sundaisai every year.
She looks forward to it every year. Please let me know if there is anything I can do for you!
text.enText:
No, no, no!　My grandson is also a horse girl, and he looks forward to the Sundaisai every year.
She looks forward to it every year. Please let me know if there is anything I can do for you!

text.jpText:
Thank you for your kind attention. At ......, gentlemen, let's head to our rooms and
Let's go to our rooms and organize our stuff. Once that's done, we'll have a meeting.
text.enText:
Thank you for your kind attention. At ......, gentlemen, let's head to our rooms and
Let's go to our rooms and organize our stuff. Once that's done, we'll have a meeting.

text.jpText:
I think we're all ready to go.
So, once again--
text.enText:
I think we're all ready to go.
So, once again--

text.jpText:
The purpose of this camp is to improve our skills for the actual Sundaisai.
I hope that each of you will understand your roles and responsibilities and work hard.
text.enText:
The purpose of this camp is to improve our skills for the actual Sundaisai.
I hope that each of you will understand your roles and responsibilities and work hard.

text.jpText:
First, Naritabu Ryan.
You'll be joining me on horseback for Yabusame.
text.enText:
First, Naritabu Ryan.
You'll be joining me on horseback for Yabusame.

text.jpText:
Yabusame (horseback archery) is a ritual in which people shoot at targets on the sacred mountain, over rocks and over cliffs with bows and arrows to purify themselves.
It is a brave and incomparable ritual to shoot and exorcise a number of targets that look like bad luck.
text.enText:
Yabusame (horseback archery) is a ritual in which people shoot at targets on the sacred mountain, over rocks and over cliffs with bows and arrows to purify themselves.
It is a brave and incomparable ritual to shoot and exorcise a number of targets that look like bad luck.

text.jpText:
But nowadays, it has been simplified a little.
Nowadays, however, it's a little simplified, and the only thing you can do is shoot at the target set up in front of the sacred mountain.
text.enText:
But nowadays, it has been simplified a little.
Nowadays, however, it's a little simplified, and the only thing you can do is shoot at the target set up in front of the sacred mountain.

text.jpText:
Nevertheless, bow practice is essential--
As I recall, you have some experience with this as a learning experience, right?
text.enText:
Nevertheless, bow practice is essential--
As I recall, you have some experience with this as a learning experience, right?

text.jpText: I was sent through ...... with my sister.
text.enText: I was sent through ...... with my sister.

text.jpText:
Hmm, maybe it's because of the tradition of horseback archery.
Kyudo as a lesson is very popular among the Uma girls.
text.enText:
Hmm, maybe it's because of the tradition of horseback archery.
Kyudo as a lesson is very popular among the Uma girls.

text.jpText:
I have some knowledge of it, but...
In this training camp, we will work together to further improve our skills.
text.enText:
I have some knowledge of it, but...
In this training camp, we will work together to further improve our skills.

text.jpText:
We have a temporary training ground nearby. The equipment has been arranged.
We'll start training this afternoon at ......, is that correct, Brian?
text.enText:
We have a temporary training ground nearby. The equipment has been arranged.
We'll start training this afternoon at ......, is that correct, Brian?

text.jpText:
I've had enough of being yelled at in my ear by the ...... empress and being told off every time I see my sister.
I'm not sure what to do.
text.enText:
I've had enough of being yelled at in my ear by the ...... empress and being told off every time I see my sister.
I'm not sure what to do.

text.jpText:
If you tell me to do it, I'll do it. ......, but I'm not going to slack off for nothing.
I'm not going to keep practicing. I'll just regain my instincts and then cut it short.
text.enText:
If you tell me to do it, I'll do it. ......, but I'm not going to slack off for nothing.
I'm not going to keep practicing. I'll just regain my instincts and then cut it short.

text.jpText:
Yeah, that's fine.
Now, about the Dedication Dance...
text.enText:
Yeah, that's fine.
Now, about the Dedication Dance...

text.jpText:
Yes, yes, yes!　Karen, Yukino-chan, and Cichy-san...
Karen, Yukino, and Cichy are going to dance a dance dedicated to the three goddesses, right?
text.enText:
Yes, yes, yes!　Karen, Yukino-chan, and Cichy-san...
Karen, Yukino, and Cichy are going to dance a dance dedicated to the three goddesses, right?

text.jpText:
Thank you, Goddess Three, for watching over us from now on.
Please keep watching over us ...... and express your feelings in a cute way!
text.enText:
Thank you, Goddess Three, for watching over us from now on.
Please keep watching over us ...... and express your feelings in a cute way!

text.jpText: Kawaii" ......!　I'm going to do my best. ......!
text.enText: Kawaii" ......!　I'm going to do my best. ......!

text.jpText:
Yukino, you need to calm down. The ...... lessons are at a nearby community center.
The instructor will be sent by the URA to ...... teach the lesson. Wasn't that right?
text.enText:
Yukino, you need to calm down. The ...... lessons are at a nearby community center.
The instructor will be sent by the URA to ...... teach the lesson. Wasn't that right?

text.jpText:
Oh. It's a URA employee who has participated in the dedication dance.
He is also scheduled to arrive here this afternoon.
text.enText:
Oh. It's a URA employee who has participated in the dedication dance.
He is also scheduled to arrive here this afternoon.

text.jpText:
I don't have much experience in dancing, let alone live dancing. ......
I'm going to make sure it's cute.
text.enText:
I don't have much experience in dancing, let alone live dancing. ......
I'm going to make sure it's cute.

text.jpText:
Okay, that's it for the ...... confirmation.
And that's it!　Good luck with your training!
text.enText:
Okay, that's it for the ...... confirmation.
And that's it!　Good luck with your training!

text.jpText:
--Whoa, whoa, whoa.
There's something I want you all to be very careful about.
text.enText:
--Whoa, whoa, whoa.
There's something I want you all to be very careful about.

text.jpText:
The body is the most important part of being an uma-daughter.
Don't get overzealous.
text.enText:
The body is the most important part of being an uma-daughter.
Don't get overzealous.

text.jpText: Make sure you pull out the 'highlighter' pen during 'practice' time for the material!
text.enText: Make sure you pull out the 'highlighter' pen during 'practice' time for the material!
